main.name: Emil Ekman
main.bio: I am a programmer and I love all things tech, from the latest smart phone to how our brains process data. I also enjoy being outside as much as possible and exploring the natural world.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Technology has been an essential part of my life. I started programming in my mid teens and I got to know the beauty in the logical thinking and problem-solving aspect in math and science. In 2019 I enrolled into an ICT degree, which I will soon finish.

work.title: CEO & Founder
work.description: My own business, I do car detailing and washing during the weekends.

work.description: Customer service and gas station work.
